ticket_description:
Source: AMAZON
Description: Arm Armv8-A core implementations utilizing speculative execution past unconditional changes in control flow may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka "straight-line speculation."

CVE Link: http://people.ubuntu.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/CVE-2020-00000

Target:
  Asset name: 082461259716.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/nucleus-test-image

Solution: Update the package to a non-vulnerable version.

References: 
Discovered By: ECR
Package Version: 8.4.0-1ubuntu1~18.04
CVSS Vector: AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N
CVSS Base Score: 2.1

Severity: Medium
Exploitable: No
Date Discovered: 2021-04-12 13:01:19

Please see https://192.168.56.103/nucleus/public/app/index.html#vuln/36000000/Q1ZFLTIwMjAtMDAwMDA-/QU1BWk9O/VnVsbg--/false/MzYwMDAwMDA-/c3VtbWFyeQ--/false for more information on these vulnerabilities
finding_description:
Arm Armv8-A core implementations utilizing speculative execution past unconditional changes in control flow may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka "straight-line speculation."

CVE Link: http://people.ubuntu.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/CVE-2020-00000
finding_recommendation: Update the package to a non-vulnerable version.
